Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 18th/ Peoria
ShortDescription: Eastbound 18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Blue Island, Roosevelt and Halsted: due to, street blockage near 18th/Peoria.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Blue Island, Roosevelt and Halsted: due to, street blockage near 18th/Peoria.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute at 111th/State
ShortDescription: 111 111th/ King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Michigan, 115th, State and 111th: due to, police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Michigan, 115th, State, 111th and over regular route, due to police activity near 111th/State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed  Wilson
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Wilson due to track switching problem in the area of Wilson. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing in the area of Wilson due to track switching problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#151 Sheridan

#36 Broadway

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
